title: Drawing, "Sketches of Single Infantry Figures and Practice Signatures", 1862
medium: Graphite, charcoal on tan-colored paper, lined; stained.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at various locations in reverse direction from left to right, at top: Winslow Homer / W/ Winslow Homer  [repeatedly].
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view a series of single soldiers, with more detailed sketches of the two soldiers at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches of Single Infantry Figures and Practice Signatures", 1862.
1862. Graphite, charcoal on tan-colored paper, lined; stained.. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-204-b.
